website_summaries.verdict: The Gel Fortitude series finds a unique place in the hearts of neutral runners with flat feet. With better ground feedback, tons of comfort, and unbelievable overpronation measures, runners with flat arches, inflexible feet, or fallen arches are on their way to more fun on the road in the Fortitude 7.
pros: Several runners admired the cushioning system of the Asics Gel Fortitude 7
It is unbelievably comfortable as based on several comments
A significant number of runners loved the traction the Asics Fortitude 7 provides
The shoe is a bargain for its price
Some runners were pleasantly surprised by the Fortitude 7’s relative flexibility
Adequate ground feedback is another great asset in this shoe, according to a few runners
cons: The shoe is quite heavy, said a few users
Mainly limited as a sturdy training partner

customer_reviews.title: sadly discontinued
customer_reviews.text: I love the gel fortitude 7 and im sad they discontinued it.... i have painfully flat severe pronating feet (6 foot 190lbs) these are the lightest slickest shoes ive ever worn that still protected my feet with excellent motion control they actually feel like slippers at times, what an achievement from asics!!! if they were cheaper i'd buy many pairs to last me years, but alas, not to be. I'm hoping to find some clearance pairs someday!!
customer_reviews.author: rainallweek

customer_reviews.title: Sort of like driving a car the didn't have suspension - it ...
customer_reviews.text: At a recent vacation I experienced severe foot pains after walking 22k steps in one day. A visit to a therapist afterwards confirmed that I have collapsed arches, which means my foot does not have the same kind of springiness that helps support my body weight during walking. Sort of like driving a car the didn't have suspension - it makes for a jarring ride. I then looked for a pair of good athletic shoes I can use with foot support, and this product does not disappoint. It's like walking on air! Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: These really help extreme overpronation.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old son has high arches, but he has extreme overpronation which causes him to flatten out his arches and walk on them. These shoes are great. He loves them and says they feel great and he can tell they help him. I have noticed that his feet, ankle and leg are now aligned and he does not overpronate at all in these shoes. I'm grateful for the product. I was skeptical about paying so much for a pair of shoes online that may or may not work, but I would buy these again with no hesitation. I may post pictures later to show the difference these make in his alignment. Also, these were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: lisa s.

customer_reviews.title: The Asics Fortitude 7 is the highest rated Asics shoe and for me, lives up to the rating.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ASICS GEL FORTITUDE 7 running shoe based being the #1 rated shoes on ASICS shoe ratings lists. I wear the Fortitude 7s more than any other pair of shoes (almost every day). I take medication for "diabetes 2". Diabetes makes my feet hurt. Asics shoes reduce the pain. In an extra wide size they minimize the pain even more, by eliminating the pressure from normal width shoes. I will be buying a spare Fortitude 7 pair of Asics shoes in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rees

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable stability shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for almost 2 years as my regular casual and workout shoes and love them. Very supportive and comfortable, I needed a good well-reviewed stability shoe. I wear thin flat Spenco insoles under full length custom orthotics, plenty of room for them. Probably overdue for my next pair! Outstanding build/construction and materials quality- the shoes look like new.
customer_reviews.author: papermate987

customer_reviews.title: A Value Purchase
customer_reviews.text: "Somewhat small" refers only to the toe box; it's snug but not uncomfortable. Heel and mid-foot are a perfect fit. Asics stability shoes include the Gel Kayano, my favorite. Next comes the GT series which is an excellent training shoe for me. While in third place is the Gel Fortitude, it is the value purchase of the group. I am a huge fan of Asics quality in their stability and cushioned shoes I prefer Asics, including the Gel Fortitude, to any other brand
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Is Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first pair of ASICS I purchased since the Dr. recommended I switch from the previous brand I was using. They fit well and I got close to 400 miles out of them before retiring them. The fit is excellent, the toe box has plenty of room and the material used for the soles is shock absorbent thus making the run smoother. This shoe brand is one I highly recommend. You definitely get your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: stan simmons

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Just received them. I tried them on and they feel good. Guess I will find out when I get out there and start using them. This is my first pair of Size 17 4E ....I usually order D but the Asics seem to have neared in the last two pairs I bought. Plus my little toes were rubbing inside the shoe. Hopefully the wider width should help.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for all day long comfort on concrete
customer_reviews.text: I stand and walk on concrete for 12 hours a day at my job and I have spent a lot of money on shoes, insoles that would support my feet for that duration and to this point these have been the best shoes I have found!! I am able to wear them witout insoles and my feet are a lot less tired at the end of my shift. I love these shoes and plan on buying more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: RS2014

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe but they messed up the shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well and is comfortable. The problem is that the right and left shoes each came with two different length shoelaces. The left is fine but the right is too long and now that I have been wearing the shoes for a while, the extra long lace has become a tripping hazard. It's too bad that I didn't catch this as soon as I started wearing them or else I would have exchanged them. Who would imagine that they would not put the same length laces in both shoes?
customer_reviews.author: Brace

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was recommended to me by physical therapist after calf injury
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was recommended to me by physical therapist after calf injury. I was surprised how much better support these have over New Balance shoes I have worn for years. Good fit for my wide feet. Excellent wear as I wear them all day in light construction work and usually go through shoes in less than a month. These will last at least 4-5 months even with me abusing them. Good price and fast service too.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: These fit perfect (12D). I dropped almost a full minute off ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear wide sized shoes. These fit perfect (12D). I dropped almost a full minute off my mile time the first time I used them!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Gardineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, great fit, very comfortable. I used to wear only New Balance but since they changed my favorite model, ASICS is my favorite athletic shoe for running and working out.
customer_reviews.author: Zander

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After having issues with my feet a few years ago, I needed to find shoes with support, comfort and still be good looking. I initially found the Asics Gel Forte, but that shoe was discontinued. Going online and in shoe stores, i knew i wanted another pair of Asics. I found these, Gel Fortitude 7, It is a little little lighter than the Forte and still providing support. Definitely sticking with Asics.
customer_reviews.author: R. REYES

customer_reviews.title: Always the best. Always buy last year's model
customer_reviews.text: I overpronate and have severe pies planus. I have been using ASICS for over ten years. Always the best. Always buy last year's model. They're the same and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases of the year
customer_reviews.text: To put it simply, I love these shoes. They felt great when I put them on the first time, but I really started to notice the benefits after running and walking in them for a week. The control you have with these shoes when running is amazing. They excel in comfort and breathability as well. I'm not one of those people that normally get excited over a shoe, but I believe these are something special. The fit was just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: These are working out well so far. I'm a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are working out well so far. I'm a heavy runner (230lbs), and these are my new go-to running show. I used to prefer the Kayano, but Asics has killed those in recent models.
customer_reviews.author: DEA

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied - Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really want to buy these online, but no retail store in my area carried this shoe in my size (mens 10 in 4E width). However, even though I've only had them for a few days, I am very satisfied. They fit well, and support my heels and arches very well. Not a big fan of the color combination, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: dagoodman4

customer_reviews.title: Good for your feet morale
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, just may have to put insoles in them for comfort for long periods of time. I wear them a lot on pavement and after a couple of hours my feet start getting achy. Could be the weakness leaving my body but I would consider by some cushiony insoles. Great for overall distance running.
customer_reviews.author: Trash Panda

customer_reviews.title: This pair is 13D and actually fits better. The size 13E was actually too wide
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a wider footbed than others that I have worn, thus it helps to prevent my foot from rolling to the outside. The first pair I had was 13E. This pair is 13D and actually fits better. The size 13E was actually too wide; I really had to lace them up tight while at the gym doing interval training, otherwise my foot would slide in the show.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - I wear orthotics after suffering plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes - I wear orthotics after suffering plantar fasciitis. I tried on shoes in a store with orthotics. I knew from reviews I'd read that since I wear size 11 on other shoes, I should order size 12. Looking forward to stretching out my mileage.
customer_reviews.author: T. Phred Man

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of foot issues- plantar fasciitis, ankle sprains, hard to fit long and narrow sizing, etc. I gave up on other pairs when I tried these. They truly are the most comfortable and supportive. I will be sticking with this brand and model for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Barter

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved the Fortitude. I'm a big guy and these shoes are great for running and working out in general. Plenty of support.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide flat feet but a neutral to under pronating gait. These things allow me to go long. Put 12 miles on them in the first 2 days. No breakin period required. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: WilliW

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear cross trainers for lifting, but recently started running. The cross trainers made my legs hurt, these were great because of all the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: DressStelters

customer_reviews.title: For flat feet
customer_reviews.text: This pronated shoe looks and feels great. I like it better then the beast 16.
customer_reviews.author: john griffin

customer_reviews.title: Better for walking than running?
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are amazingly comfortable but seem much better to walk in than run in. The bottom is a bit harder than I would like compared to GT Asics Ive had.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Sizing has changed over the year
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the exact same model one year ago. Same size - when I compare that shoe with this one I just ordered, the new one is significantly smaller. Not sure what happened with the sizing - not sure how many sizes to go up now -
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe: 4.5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe performed as advertised. A little heavier than I would like but great for long distance training. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The feel so comfy and cushioned. True to size. We all wear Asics to walk, cycle and take urban hikes.
customer_reviews.author: misr2us

customer_reviews.title: Very nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice running shoes. Good price. Used on a treadmill and very happy with these shoes so far. Color as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lorincz

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I always buy Asics because I have wide feet and they are one of the few to go wide. Upon receiving them I loved them so much I ordered a second pair. The color is awesome for me because I am a huge GA Bulldawgs fan.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Walls

customer_reviews.title: My husband said that these are the most comfortable shoe he has worn in a long time
customer_reviews.text: My husband said that these are the most comfortable shoe he has worn in a long time! He is not a running but is an avid walker and these provide him great support and cushion!
customer_reviews.author: bookreviewer23

customer_reviews.title: I'm rating these a 5 as they are really comfortable running shoes (run 3-4 miles per day) as reviewed ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating these a 5 as they are really comfortable running shoes (run 3-4 miles per day) as reviewed by Runner's World (I believe it was where I read about them). They do come about 1⁄4-1⁄2 size small in length, so may need to take that into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: AMerryHome

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, loose fitting, shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very good for dry weather walking, office use, travel (car, air, train).
customer_reviews.author: Maple

customer_reviews.title: He always comments on how comfortable they are when he wears them
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves his asics and that they come in wide enough sizes for his feet. He always comments on how comfortable they are when he wears them.
customer_reviews.author: Abby R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, fit great, as well.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes now fit well.. Thank you for your time, patience, diligence & kindness. You & your company have been great to work with, take care...
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, good price
customer_reviews.text: Not a runner, but am wearing these to walk on my treadmill . I was pleased to find these in my size 17. So far, so good. Shoes are light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: big foot

customer_reviews.title: These fit great and are the most comfortable shoe I have
customer_reviews.text: It is soooo hard to find shoes that fit me because of my wide width. These fit great and are the most comfortable shoe I have. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, not too expensive. Shipped in 2 days for free. Very satisfied 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just what was wanted. Looks good and it's comfortable. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: D. Hartigan

customer_reviews.title: They work great for me and fit like a glove out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Long time user of Asics running shoes. This will be my eighth pair of Gel Fortitude shoes over the past 8 years. They work great for me and fit like a glove out of the box. I get the 4E width which gives me plenty of room in the toe box and prevents my feet from "falling asleep" and tingling during a long run.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy griswold

customer_reviews.title: The best crosses on the market!
customer_reviews.text: The best crosses for running I have ever had! Excellent for flat feet, highly recommend! P.S. Order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ucha Avsajanishvili

customer_reviews.title: decent price for a durable and decently comfortable shoe. However I'm not sure Id buy again---Still ...
customer_reviews.text: decent price for a durable and decently comfortable shoe. However I'm not sure Id buy again---Still looking for a replacement for my usual running shoe (Brooks Beast).
customer_reviews.author: Vorhaden

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoes I had
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I got these. These shoes provide all the support in the right places and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size larger than current Asics and fits fine. Suggest ordering 1/2 size larger for better toe clearance.
customer_reviews.author: RayRDX

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for people with flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this shoe if you have flat feet and need motion controlled shoes with good arch supports. I have had to replace the shoe's insoles with another insole that has arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: martin pszczola

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price but not exactly what I wanted. Product seems to be of high quality though and I’m currently wearing them to see if toe box just needs to be broken in
customer_reviews.author: Hunter C. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best pair of shoes that I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: OK but did not fit right
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, but size was tight and small have returns for another brand
customer_reviews.author: joe d

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great when I run, fit is a little snug but not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gomez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, this is my third pair! Too bad the shipping got messed up. Why pay for free shipping if my package takes longer
customer_reviews.author: southerneye

customer_reviews.title: This shoe worked admirably for cushioning my flat foot, ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe worked admirably for cushioning my flat foot, relieving knee pain. however, the heel lining wore out very quickly. within 6months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Birkhofer

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! Shoe is a little tight by the laces but overall good fit for EEEE!
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable. I weigh 230 and shoe does very well.
customer_reviews.author: hi.sadie

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fortitudes
customer_reviews.text: Love the Fortitudes. I'm a big guy (260lbs). These shoes fit great and provide support. This is my 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pennamite

customer_reviews.title: happy happy joy joy
customer_reviews.text: high quality. very comfortable. light weight. snug. i been used to wearing shoes too large. i guess this is how shoes are supposed to feel.
customer_reviews.author: joshman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and the blue collar is very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and the blue collar is very attractive. I can wear all day while standing/walking/taking many stairs and my feet and legs feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Queens Determination

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying these shoes very much - very light ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying these shoes very much - very light, too. I have already used on trail and treadmill. They be workin' for me!
customer_reviews.author: Buck Buick

customer_reviews.title: I needed good shoes to properly support my arches all day
customer_reviews.text: I recently transformed my desk to a standing desk. As such, I needed good shoes to properly support my arches all day, as my feet were beginning to hurt. These shoes are amazing! My feet are healing and feel great, even after standing all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect labeling of size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were mislabeled for size, so had to return. Not even close to correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I really like this shoe. It is a lighter shoe but is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ed c. huss

customer_reviews.title: Overpronators Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ive had to date. Heavy pronator and these do the trick
customer_reviews.author: JP Collins

customer_reviews.title: but I've used them for 3 months now and they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I still use my own orthotics, but I've used them for 3 months now and they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I have room to move around but it seems like the top over my pinky toe and toe next ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 which is what I have in my Puma running shoes, but these are just too tight around my toe area. I have room to move around but it seems like the top over my pinky toe and toe next to that one is suffocating. The shoes are extremely comfortable and I enjoy wearing them. I'm going to go to a local mall to see if size 10.5 makes any difference for me before deciding whether or not to buy these again or go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cmx3d2

customer_reviews.title: One of the better pairs of shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these shoes to anyone with excessively flat feet or anyone looking for a nice boost in arch support. After wearing many other brands such as Brooks and being disappointed in how expensive they are to how short they actually last I can say with confidence that Asics is my go to brand for shoes that provide comfortable everyday usability and support. I am someone who walks 15 miles a day 6 days a week on the job so having a shoe that lasts and is comfortable is a top priority for me.
customer_reviews.author: LtMajorBones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supporting shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredible. I have flat feet. I put my custom orthotics in these shoes and now I can wear nothing else. Incredible support and nice looking to boot! Some bullets: 1. Very nice design for a running shoe. Most are extremely geeky 2. Amazing support, my angles feel very well supported 3. Allows for custom orthotics, a must for me Will buy additional pairs to keep as backup!! If you felt my review was of high quality and helped you make your decision please indicate so below. Thanks and have a great day!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good fit-- a little on the narrow side, which I need. Nice combination of support and cushioning for this 220 pounder
customer_reviews.author: Mosie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes just keep awalking!
customer_reviews.text: Have just worn them from Denver - around the streets of San Francisco - for more than twelve hours and just commented how comfortable they still are !
customer_reviews.author: S W V

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Asics for several years; my favorite style was discontinued so I opted for this shoe. Toe box is very wide, and the shoe pinches my heel(RT shoe only). I have been working on breaking them in for a few weeks, so returning them is no option. I swapped the sole inserts for some old Nike inserts and I got some relief; as the Nikes provided good arch support and made the fit more comfy. I ordered my usual size - 8.5 4E
customer_reviews.author: Redcatcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good works great in the gym and cardio. fit was on the money for me,.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I ever owned. Huge cushion and great support.
customer_reviews.author: Chadj

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this pair of shoes before and knew what to expect. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Asics especially the color scheme. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. Excellent quality and they are holding up good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Friendomellon

customer_reviews.title: I'll be looking for other color options but may never ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll be looking for other color options but may never buy a different shoe than the ASICS Gel Fortitude, ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do a good job keeping my ankle from rolling in when I walk/run while being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: This came as replacement for an old Fortitude 4 that was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Size fit perfectly. The support feels somehow strange so far, but I used it for only a day so far. This came as replacement for an old Fortitude 4 that was perfect for me. the color combination is better than I expected from the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. Best pair of runners I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for wide flat feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneaks! Buy a new pair every 3 months..
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these because I have a bone spur in my heel and the gel cushions it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Sound like horses
customer_reviews.text: Second pair that really are noisy as I land with my orthotics inserted. Sound like horses galloping
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Dad Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my father. He has terrible arch problems and a toe longer than another. I can only go by his recommendation, but he absolutely loves these. Says they fit perfect, have held up to his long walks, and has not suffered any fatigue in them. I cannot recommend these for running because I haven't run in this model, but if they're like my other Asics I'm sure they're good. I'm just happy that my father is enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jerauld

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore that for 10 hours straight yesterday. Running around, standing, stooping...very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for flat feet. Lots of support and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: curious

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave as a gift to my husband and his favorite tennis shoe now.
customer_reviews.author: augirl

customer_reviews.title: ... my first run with them yesterday and they were comfortable on day 1
customer_reviews.text: Did my first run with them yesterday and they were comfortable on day 1, which is the biggest compliment I can give them.
customer_reviews.author: R.M

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly, which is rare for me! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, which is rare for me! I do have SLIGHTLY WIDE feet, so bear that in mind when you make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hanauh

customer_reviews.title: ... tape to secure the box but the shoes were fine
customer_reviews.text: The outer box had been crushed and it appeared someone applied more tape to secure the box but the shoes were fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obe of the best I have got so far
customer_reviews.text: I have run more than 300 miles in this shoes. Obe of the best I have got so far.looking for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: nagarajan

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on a Pillow
customer_reviews.text: As someone with bad feet, these shoes were a God-send! They fit well, and the extra padding on the soles of the shoes make them great for walking and exercising. It's like I'm walking on a pillow! The one criticism I would have would be that the shoe is on the heavier side, so while running/jogging may be good, it's not quite light enough to aid in exercises like P90x or other activities requiring fast turning and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit...bought for my son who has pronation problems and runs cross country. He did say that they are a bit heavy as expected but I used to hear him complain about legs and ankle issues all the time and now none of that. SO that is definitely an endorsement. As far as looks are concerned though, this is a rather plain looking shoe and not really fashionable so that's why I only gave it 4 stars. Come up with some better looks and well as the great functionality and you get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, feel good. Still some knee pain with long runs, but generally a pretty good ride
customer_reviews.author: David Brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Work great for long periods of standing or walking. I typically walk 7-10 miles in an 8 hour shift and these are probably the most comfortable shoes I have in my "shoe rotation" I wear them when I expect to have an extra busy day at work. Lose a star for structural integrity and overall quality because I put holes in the top of both shoes within the first 30 miles I wore these shoes. Most shoes from Asics I can usually get over 100 miles out of them before I put holes through the top. (My big toes rub oddly on the top of shoes creating holes. Not sure why.)
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the ASICS Gel Fortitude 7 for people who have to walk or run a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cushioned sole and 4E width in which I walk a lot at my job!
customer_reviews.author: Randy J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, durable, and breathable. I wouldn't recommend them for extreme cold weather since they are so breezy, but all other times they are great! I don't get sore feet at all while wearing them all day. Durable laces that don't fray. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: scrubbers

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, needs new insoles
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, insoles need to be replaced, they were way too soft and gave little support during running.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for under pronation
customer_reviews.text: Got em for $75. The doc said I need shoes specifically designed for under-pronation, and the Fortitude has delivered. They have reinforced heel stability and a thick, plush sole with a guidance line and plastic hardware. The material is fairly stain-resistant, and the toe seems more hefty than my GT-2000s. I dislike the color scheme, but I wear a 4E, so I am generally more concerned with the utility factor than style. High quality. Reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: spanky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, it has a really thick sole which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size was the same as previous pair as Asics.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of ordering was liked the most. Not having my preferred color was disliked the most.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G. Martin, Sr.

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Fortitude 7 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Built for the upmost comfort, the Asics GEL-Fortitude? 7 sneaker is the prime choice for any running enthusiast. Designed with Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL? Cushioning System, it provides the upmost comfort with every stride. In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
feature_bullets: Stability running shoe in breathable mesh with textured logo overlays and toe bumper
Guidance Line vertical flex groove with Guidance Trusstic System
